message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.OH, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the problem of optimizing power allocation in a visible light positioning (VLP) system, which involves communication and localization aspects. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.IT (Information Theory), which deals with the fundamental limits of communication and information processing. The paper also considers practical constraints such as power limitations and illuminance constraints, which are related to networking and systems aspects, respectively. Therefore, cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) and cs.SY (Systems and Control) are also likely categories. The paper also addresses the issue of imperfect knowledge of localization parameters, which is related to optimization and learning aspects. Therefore, cs.OH (Optimization and Control) is another possible category. Finally, the paper presents numerical results to illustrate the proposed approaches, which is related to machine learning and data analysis aspects. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also a possible category.
